text: hi my name is Rebecca and in today's

and sometime there is a difference all
right
not just in spelling the first one of
course I said some times with the S and
the second one I said some time without
the S let's understand exactly what the
difference is between these two okay so
when I say that I do something sometimes
it means that I do it on certain
occasions not all the time for example
sometimes I go trophy right
sometimes I go shopping in the middle of
the week I don't do it all the time I do
it sometimes right for example sometimes
I pick up dinner from an Indian
restaurant
another example sometimes I wish I had
completed university right so this means
I don't think that or do that all the
time but only on certain occasions so if
this is time right if this is a timeline
representing time I do it only on
certain occasions and not continuously
through that time all right
that's sometimes so there is certainty
here I know when I do these things I
know when I think of these things
correct there is certainty let's
contrast that with the second one which
is some time now the words some time is
used to describe something that happens
at an unknown time or place in the past
or the future what do we mean by that
what do we mean by an unknown time
for example suppose you're telling me
about John and you say John got married
some time last year right you don't know
exactly when but you know then he got
married last year so you say John got
married some time last year or okay just
woman that one is to describe the past
correct because it was last year now
let's see how we can refer to an
uncertain period of time in the future I
would like to visit Italy sometime next
year or I would like to visit Italy some
time in my life I don't know when so
there is uncertainty right so this
uncertainty could refer to the past as
in the example with when John got
married or it could refer to uncertainty
in the future so if I say see you some
time means some at some point in the
future which we don't know right now
which is not certain but if I tell you
that I meet John sometimes it means that
we meet on certain occasions but not all
the time okay I know sometimes English
can be quite frustrating one little
letter an S can completely change the
